situation:
CE Board May 2010
A 6m cantilever retaining wall is loaded with an active pressure which varies from zero at the top to 35kN/m at the bottom. Assume EI is constant.

subquestions.question: If the wall is laterally supported at the free end and fixed at the base, determine the moment at the foundation. Use end moment equation wL²/30 at the top and wL²/20 at the base.
